message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and features, I believe it's worth more than what others are paying, but I'm willing to start our negotiation at $120. Looking forward to your response!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $120 is still a bit high for me. I'm only willing to pay $80 at this point. Let's see if we can find common ground.
